name: Squid Grid (Android Beta)
description:
Enjoy the first 38 levels of Squid Grid! We hope that players enjoy testing this build and provide feedback.

CONTROLS: Swipe to move any direction. Hold finger after swipe to auto-swim.  Quickly double-tap to Undo.

You can swipe to see higher levels on the level select screen. You might need to press a level twice to start. 

*Please provide any feedback on the game so far*

Mechanics and Level Design by Michael Pohling

Code and UI Design by Osama Yahya

Publisher: Head Scratch Games

Coming Soon:

UI Upgrades

Animations

More Levels

Story Elements
